deskripsi: An internal web-based admin system designed to centralize and manage customer purchase data efficiently.
detailed_deskripsi: Bagonk is a comprehensive internal admin dashboard built to streamline the management of customer purchase data. It features real-time data visualization, user role management, and detailed reporting tools. The system is designed with a focus on usability and efficiency, allowing administrators to quickly access and process order information. Key features include automated invoice generation, customer purchase history tracking, and inventory integration.

deskripsi: Nutriflakes is a health-focused product website that showcases a natural cereal brand designed to support digestive health.
detailed_deskripsi: This project involved creating a high-performance landing page for Nutriflakes, a cereal brand focused on digestive health. The website is optimized for conversion and SEO, featuring fast load times and a responsive design. It includes sections for product benefits, customer testimonials, and a secure checkout process. The tech stack ensures the site is easily maintainable and scalable.

deskripsi: Healthygrain.id is a health product website showcasing HealthyGrain®, a multigrain oat drink rich in fiber and nutrients.
detailed_deskripsi: Healthygrain.id is a digital storefront for a premium multigrain oat drink. The website highlights the nutritional benefits of the product through engaging visuals and informative content. It features a custom CMS integration for easy content updates and a seamless e-commerce experience for customers. The design reflects the natural and healthy aspects of the brand.

deskripsi: Javastefia77.id is an official product site for Javastefia77®, a premium liquid stevia sweetener.
detailed_deskripsi: This website serves as the official platform for Javastefia77, a natural sugar alternative. The site educates users on the benefits of stevia and provides an easy way to purchase the product. It includes a blog section for recipes and health tips, further engaging the community. Built with modern web technologies, it ensures a smooth user experience across all devices.

deskripsi: Genvit.id is a digital health-oriented e-commerce platform providing quality health products.
detailed_deskripsi: Genvit is a robust e-commerce platform dedicated to health and wellness products. It features a dynamic catalog, real-time inventory management using Socket.IO, and a secure payment gateway integration. The platform is built to handle high traffic and provides advanced analytics for the business owners to track sales and user behavior.
